<:WTS:708489317168971778> CircleBoy boards! At least 2 available at this time. This is a simple circuit board that converts a 3DS circle pad analog stick into signals that replace the dpad for the GBA (and GBC). Installation gallery - https://imgur.com/a/vMOLDO8, More Info/Files - https://github.com/orangeglo/CircleBoy

**$15** shipped in the US! Assembled and tested board only, no circle pad is included.
